bibl.title: Votive Deposits of the Ptolemaic Period in North Abydos.
bibl.note: Introduction. - Analysis of the intact ceramic vessels associated with the votive zone cult structure. - The archaeological context of the vessels. - Interpretation of the significance of the ceramic group within the context of the ritual landscape of Abydos.
bibl.seg: Mary-Ann Pouls Wegner, Votive Deposits of the Ptolemaic Period in North Abydos.
Cahiers de la céramique égyptienne 9 (2011) pp. 415-436, 7 pll.

Introduction. - Analysis of the intact ceramic vessels associated with the votive zone cult structure. - The archaeological context of the vessels. - Interpretation of the significance of the ceramic group within the context of the ritual landscape of Abydos.
